messages.title: It's a two horse race
messages.content: Conservatives plan 10% cut to School budgets.

messages.title: School meals success
messages.content: Free school meals for all 5-11 year olds, improved atmosphere and behavior

messages.title: Local Pensioners Better off
messages.content: Over 7,800 pensioners living in Oxford West & Abingdon will receive at least an extra £950 a year thanks to Liberal Democrat pensions policy.

messages.title: Fast Broadband
messages.content: Connecting Oxford West & Abingdon to fast broadband - essential for homes and businesses

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Conservatives plan 10% cut to School budgets. Lib Dems made a record investment in schools.
Lib Dems introduced free school meals for all 5-11 year olds, which improved atmosphere and behavior.
Liberal Democrat pensions policy ensures over 7,800 pensioners receive at least an extra £950 a year.
Commitment to connecting Oxford West & Abingdon to fast broadband, essential for homes and businesses.

issues.education: Record investment in schools; free school meals for all 5-11 year olds.
